name: OctoFren
description:
My girlfriend always wanted one of those Octopus cuddly toys and for Christmas I will gift her one of those and this small and cute game.

Feed your Octos to set them free and be able to buy beautiful scenery for your fren's aquarium.

Credits:

A game by me: Tobias Heukäufer (Itch Profile)

Music credits to:

Musicfox - Underwater Secrets

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

This game was created at the Game Design // UE at the University of Europe for Applied Sciences.

Supervised by: Prof. Csongor Baranyai

"Games A Week" (Winter Semester 2020/21)
